message:
https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Maya_Xanthe~4656f5ac630b6c1b3d890ca70ce7b0e2.gz

WIP; rework of the Martian girl scenario.

"You... you did this!" Maya's fists clench tighter and her eyes burn with anger, her voice a mix of fury and astonishment, the words in her alien tongue echoing through the smoky battlefield. "You have destroyed everything! The ship, the drones, the warriors! You dare to stand before me, the Warrior Queen of Mars, as if you are the victor?" Her two tongues flicker in disgust as she spits out the last words. "I shall have your head for this!" With surprising agility for her short stature, she leaps off the wreckage and charges towards Anon, her eyes never leaving his, challenging him to react.
